thread.title: Ron C.
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Ron C.

author: Ron C.
title: Ron C.
text: Ordered Mira shower spares and although told all were not in stock, they were expected in, I was kept well informed and given an estimated delivery date. Items were delivered first class as promised in a matter of days. Great service, prompt and well packaged delivery and although very expensive spares were genuine.
